metadata.title: The Return of the Time-Honored Classic Lit Club

tracks.text: Pink cherry blossoms bloom. Petals fall as high school students walk to school. A boy with green eyes and short hair walks past students advertising clubs.
He opens and closes a locker.
Hotaro shows a piece of paper to Satoshi.
Sports team runs by.
Hotaro slips into the faculty office and checks out a key to the Earth Science room.
He climbs stairs, passing a janitor carrying a ladder.
He tries the door to the Earth Science Prep Room. It's doesn't move, so he pulls a key out of his pocket.
He walks in, closes the door behind him, and looks up. A girl with waist length black hair stares out the open window.
As he approaches her, time slows down. Our view heightens in clarity.
The girl turns to look at us. She has purple eyes.
She wears a knee length black skirt and sailor style long sleeved shirt with a blue ribbon. Her school bag sits on a table in the middle of the room.
The wind blows her hair.
She stares
He stares
She sees him staring
He sees her staring
She smiles
Intro.
End intro.
He squints and tilts his head.
She grabs his bag.
Her eyes sparkle.
She blocks the door
She grabs his hands and clasps them in hers.
In a fantasy sequence, her hair grows and entangles him within the room. Green flowers sprout from the web of hair.
Hotaro looks up, back in the room. Chitanda stares intently, while Satoshi watches.
He walks to the open door. It has a metal plate with just a key hole. Hotaro peers at it.
Hotaro stares down while tugging on his bangs. He looks up and leaves the classroom.
A janitor installs fluorescent tube lights on a ceiling.
The janitor leaves the room, carrying a ladder.
He unlocks a door.
He opens doors, works on lights, and unlocks another.
He locks all the doors.
The 3 students walk up the stairs. They look out a window.
A single floor, traditional style Japanese building standing off to the side. Later, Hotaro shuts his locker.
She holds out a palm.
He stares into her eyes. In a sparkly fantasy sequence, he's ensnared in a glittery nest of black ropes and green flowers.
In reality, he hands her a slip of paper.
Hotaro looks away
Chitanda's smiling face fills our view.
A scroll reads Seimei: When all of nature is bright and clear, and we see what grasses have sprouted.
Hotaro looks at the auxiliary building across the courtyard.
Clock shows 4:37pm
Hotaro writes quickly.
Chitanda opens the classroom door.
Hotaro glances up at Chitanda, then returns to his essay. She looks at him eagerly.
Chitanda gasps
Hotaro folds his essay.
They walk down stairs
Letters pour out of the bulletin board, pooling at their feet, growing to a sea that drowns Hotaro.
He lifts a flyer, revealing a small note taped underneath. Chitanda approaches and looks. It reads, Joro Spider Society, filling 2 vacancies. 06021722LL.
Later, Hotaro stands on a sidewalk under an umbrella.
Hotaro keeps walking. Satoshi runs after him.
Satoshi runs across the street.
Satoshi walks by a store with dolls in traditional clothing. Hotaro glares at him, standing in front of a restaurant.
He walks in the rain, umbrella folded at his side. Text appears, The niece of time.
Outro.
